title: Storm water runoff increases sediment pollution

content.prompt: Storm water runoff from the new development into nearby Samel Creek will likely lead to which of the following? 

choices.label: Biomagnification of mercury in birds of prey such as eagles and osprey
Improved recreational opportunities for swimmers and boaters
Destruction of fish habitats by high levels of suspended solids and sediments
Contamination of drinking water supplies by volatile organic compounds such as ozone
Increased incidence of waterborne diseases such as malaria

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how environmental concepts and processes represented visually relate to broader environmental issues.
